attributes.action: Give Asia Bibi and her family asylum in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The Pakistani government has caved in to the protesters and refused to let her leave the country essentially giving her another death sentence.
attributes.background: Asia Bibi is a Pakistani Christian woman who was accused of blasphemy by several Muslim women in 2010. She was inprisoned and was on death row and has now just been released which has caused riots across the country with thousands of Islamists wanting her dead!
